get.summary: Gets a list of customer memberships
get.description: Gets a list of customer memberships

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Format - int64. Tenant ID

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Perform lookup by multiple IDs (maximum 50)

parameters.name: customerIds
parameters.description: Filters by customer IDs

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Filters by membership status\
Values: [Active, Suspended, Expired, Canceled, Deleted]

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Format - int32. Filters by membership duration (in months); use null for ongoing memberships

parameters.name: billingFrequency
parameters.description:
Filters by membership billing frequency\
Values: [OneTime, Monthly, EveryOtherMonth, Quarterly, BiAnnual, Annual]

parameters.name: active
parameters.description:
What kind of items should be returned (only active items will be returned by default)\
Values: [True, Any, False]

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Return items created before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: createdOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Return items created on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: modifiedBefore
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Return items modified before certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: modifiedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Return items modified on or after certain date/time (in UTC)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Format - int32. The logical number of page to return, starting from 1

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Format - int32. How many records to return (50 by default)

parameters.name: includeTotal
parameters.description: Whether total count should be returned

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

parameters.name: createdBefore

get.summary: Provides export feed for membership types
get.description: Provides export feed for membership types

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Format - int64. Tenant ID

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
Continuation token received from previous export request in "continueFrom" field.
When not specified, the export process starts from the beginning.\
Use custom date strings, e.g. "2020-01-01" to start the export process from the certain point in time.

parameters.name: includeRecentChanges
parameters.description:
Use "true" to start receiving the most recent changes quicker.
Note this may cause the same results appearing multiple times on consecutive requests.

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

Follow up status \
Values: [NotAttempted, Unreachable, Contacted, Won, Dismissed]

parameters.name: createdOnOrAfter

post.summary: Marks the specified recurring service event as complete
post.description:
Marking an event as complete links the job with provided JobID to the given Location Recurring Service Event.
It will also copy over invoice items to the Job Invoice corresponding to the Invoice Template of the
Location Recurring Service the Event was generated from.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Format - int64. Recurring service event ID

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Format - int64. Tenant ID

requestBody.description: Recurring service event status update request

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

post.summary: Marks the specified recurring service event as incomplete
post.description:
Marking an event as incomplete unlinks the job with provided JobID to the given Location Recurring Service
Event. It will also delete the invoice items that were copied over when the Location Recurring Service Event
was marked as completed on the Job.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Format - int64. Recurring service event ID

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Format - int64. Tenant ID

requestBody.description: Recurring service event status update request

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

get.summary: Gets recurring service type specified by ID
get.description: Gets recurring service type specified by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Format - int64. Recurring service type ID

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Format - int64. Tenant ID

400.description: The request cannot be processed, check validation errors or request format

page.description: From which page this output has started

pageSize.description: Page size for this query (i.e. how many records were requested to return)

hasMore.description: True if there are more records in the query than returned in this result

totalCount.description: Total count of records for this query (can optionally be populated)

data.description: The collection of result items, will never have more than PageSize items

createdById.description: ID of the user that created this membership

modifiedOn.description: When customer membership was last modified

cancellationDate.description: When customer membership was or will be cancelled

billingFrequency.description: How often the customer membership is billed

status.description: Current status of the customer membership

followUpStatus.description: Follow-up status of the customer membership

duration.description: Duration of customer membership in months

membershipTypeId.description: The membership type ID of the customer membership

activatedById.description: ID of the user that activated this membership

activatedFromId.description: ID of the invoice item that is the sale task of this membership

billingTemplateId.description: ID of the invoice template used for membership billing

cancellationInvoiceId.description: ID of the invoice that either charged or refunded the deferred revenue balance of the customer membership

locationId.description: ID of location for this customer membership

renewalMembershipTaskId.description: Task ID that renews this membership

renewedById.description: ID of the user that renewed this membership

soldById.description: ID of the user that was credited for the sale of this membership

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by server

traceId.description: Internal trace ID for advanced diagnostics

errors.description: Provides more details about errors occurred, which can potentially be used for visual display

data.description: Provides additional data, intended for programmatical usage

ApiErrorResponse.description: Detailed error response, following RFC 7807 recommendations (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807).

ActiveRequestArg.description: Represents possible HTTP query argument values, when applying filters based on active status.

page.description: From which page this output has started

pageSize.description: Page size for this query (i.e. how many records were requested to return)

hasMore.description: True if there are more records in the query than returned in this result

totalCount.description: Total count of records for this query (can optionally be populated)

data.description: The collection of result items, will never have more than PageSize items

id.description: The ID of the custom field.

name.description: The name of the custom field.

dataType.description: Indicates the data type of the custom field.

dataTypeOptions.description: Indicates the dropdown options if the custom field is a dropdown data type.

createdOn.description: The date the custom field was created in UTC date / time.

modifiedOn.description: The last date the custom field was modified in UTC date / time.

id.description: ID of the status change record

note.description: Optional note attached to this status change

createdOn.description: When this status change record was created

createdById.description: ID of the user that created this status change record

ModificationResponse.description: Default response when creating object with a new ID, or updating object by specified ID.

businessUnitId.description: ID of the Business Unit associated with this membership

nextScheduledBillDate.description: Next date that this membership will be billed on

from.description: The starting date of this membership

to.description: The end date of this membership (null if ongoing)

soldById.description: ID of the user that was credited for the sale of this membership

billingTemplateId.description:
The ID of the invoice template used to bill this membership.
Can either be a "settings template" (when invoice template is shared  in this case new invoice template will be created),
or be a new invoice template created specifically for this customer membership.

locationId.description: Discount location ID of this membership (null if all locations)

recurringServiceAction.description:
Required if RecurringLocationId is set.
Determines how many of the customer's locations that recurring services should be added to: all, single, or none (which deletes existing recurring services).

recurringLocationId.description: The location at which recurring services are scheduled (null if all locations)

paymentMethodId.description:
The ID of the payment method (credit card or bank account) that should be used for this membership. This
field is mutually exclusive with payment type. Only one or the other can be set at a time.

paymentTypeId.description:
The payment type (cash, check, etc) that should be used for this membership. This field is mutually
exclusive with payment type. Only one or the other can be set at a time. Setting payment type means we will
not automatically use a payment method to bill the membership and payment will have to be collected manually.

renewalMembershipTaskId.description: The ID of the service that will be used as the default to renew this membership.

initialDeferredRevenue.description:
The amount of deferred revenue that this membership should start with that is not accounted for
in the sale task.

cancellationBalanceInvoiceId.description: The ID of the invoice created upon membership cancellation in order to zero out the deferred revenue balance.

cancellationInvoiceId.description:
The ID of the invoice optionally created upon membership cancellation in order to charge (or refund) the
customer if deferred revenue balance is not 0.

customerMembershipId.description: ID of customer membership that was created

customerId.description: ID of the customer you are creating the Membership Sale Invoice for

saleTaskId.description: ID of the sale task that is creating the membership

durationBillingId.description: ID of the duration/billing option to be used

locationId.description: Discount location ID of this membership (null if all locations)

recurringServiceAction.description:
Required if RecurringLocationId is set.
Determines how many of the customer's locations that recurring services should be added to: all, single, or none (which deletes existing recurring services).

recurringLocationId.description: The location at which recurring services are scheduled (null if all locations)

hasMore.description:
Indicates whether the export feed has reached its logical "end", or if there is more to export.
True means the consumer can invoke another request right away using new continuation token value.
False means there is now new data for the export, and the consumer should wait for some time (5-10 minutes)
before making another request.

continueFrom.description: Continuation token used to resume the export operation. The value should be used in "from" query parameter of the following request.

data.description: The collection of exported items, usually sorted chronologically based on modification date

createdById.description: ID of the user that created this membership type

displayName.description: Membership type display name. This is used in the Customer Portal and will be null if not set through the Membership Wizard.

autoCalculateInvoiceTemplates.description: Whether invoice templates should be auto-calculated

useMembershipPricingTable.description: Whether membership pricing table should be used

showMembershipSavings.description: Whether membership savings should be displayed

Indicates whether the export feed has reached its logical "end", or if there is more to export.
True means the consumer can invoke another request right away using new continuation token value.
False means there is now new data for the export, and the consumer should wait for some time (5-10 minutes)
before making another request.

modifiedOn.description: When recurring service type was modified

active.description: Whether recurring service type is active

recurrenceType.description: The recurrence type (e.g. Daily, Weekly, Monthly)

recurrenceInterval.description: The recurrence interval for the given recurrence type

recurrenceMonths.description: A list of months when the recurring service occurs, if it is a seasonal recurrence type

durationLength.description: The recurrence duration length (number of events)

Memberships.V2.Month.description: Month name as a string, e.g. "January" or "May"

data.description: The collection of exported items, usually sorted chronologically based on modification date

name.description: Invoice template name (used only for shared invoice templates)

createdById.description: ID of the user that created invoice template

isSettingsTemplate.description: Whether invoice template is shared (i.e. visible on the Settings page)

items.description: A list of invoice template items

workflowActionItemId.description: The invoice item ID that created this invoice template item via ModifyMembershipWorkflowAction

hasMore.description:
Indicates whether the export feed has reached its logical "end", or if there is more to export.
True means the consumer can invoke another request right away using new continuation token value.
False means there is now new data for the export, and the consumer should wait for some time (5-10 minutes)
before making another request.

continueFrom.description: Continuation token used to resume the export operation. The value should be used in "from" query parameter of the following request.

data.description: The collection of exported items, usually sorted chronologically based on modification date

createdById.description: ID of the user that created this recurring service

durationLength.description: The duration length for the given duration type

invoiceTemplateForFollowingYearsId.description: Invoice template ID for the 2nd year and following (for ongoing memberships)

activatedFromId.description: ID of the invoice item that is the sale task of this membership

recurrenceType.description: The recurrence type (e.g. Daily, Weekly, Monthly, etc.)

recurrenceInterval.description:
The recurrence interval for the given recurrence type.
Can be 0 when RecurrenceType is Seasonal.

recurrenceMonths.description: A list of months when the recurring service occurs, if it is a seasonal recurrence type

recurrenceDaysOfWeek.description:
A list specifying which days of the week this recurring service recurs when
RecurrenceType is Weekly

recurrenceWeek.description:
Enum value corresponding to which week of the month this recurring service recurs when
RecurrenceType is NthWeekdayOfMonth. Used with RecurrenceDayOfNthWeek.

recurrenceDayOfNthWeek.description:
Enum value corresponding to which day of the week this recurring service recurs when
RecurrenceType is NthWeekdayOfMonth. Used with RecurrenceWeek.

recurrenceDaysOfMonth.description:
A list of days of the month on which this recurring service recurs when
RecurrenceType is Monthly.

Memberships.V2.WeekDay.description: Day of week as a string, e.g. "Monday" or "Thursday"

hasMore.description:
Indicates whether the export feed has reached its logical "end", or if there is more to export.
True means the consumer can invoke another request right away using new continuation token value.
False means there is now new data for the export, and the consumer should wait for some time (5-10 minutes)
before making another request.

continueFrom.description: Continuation token used to resume the export operation. The value should be used in "from" query parameter of the following request.

data.description: The collection of exported items, usually sorted chronologically based on modification date

jobId.description: ID of the job associated with this event

createdById.description:
ID of the user that created this event (could happen as a result of
editing recurring service, selling a new membership, etc.)

active.description: Whether this event still exists, or was deleted already.

hasMore.description:
Indicates whether the export feed has reached its logical "end", or if there is more to export.
True means the consumer can invoke another request right away using new continuation token value.
False means there is now new data for the export, and the consumer should wait for some time (5-10 minutes)
before making another request.

continueFrom.description: Continuation token used to resume the export operation. The value should be used in "from" query parameter of the following request.

id.description: ID of the status change record

note.description: Optional note attached to this status change

createdOn.description: When this status change record was created

createdById.description: ID of the user that created this status change record

membershipId.description: ID of the membership that this status change record is associated with

page.description: From which page this output has started

pageSize.description: Page size for this query (i.e. how many records were requested to return)

hasMore.description: True if there are more records in the query than returned in this result

totalCount.description: Total count of records for this query (can optionally be populated)

data.description: The collection of result items, will never have more than PageSize items

page.description: From which page this output has started

pageSize.description: Page size for this query (i.e. how many records were requested to return)

hasMore.description: True if there are more records in the query than returned in this result

totalCount.description: Total count of records for this query (can optionally be populated)

data.description: The collection of result items, will never have more than PageSize items

displayName.description: Membership type display name. This is used in the Customer Portal and will be null if not set through the Membership Wizard.

autoCalculateInvoiceTemplates.description: Whether invoice templates should be auto-calculated

useMembershipPricingTable.description: Whether membership pricing table should be used

showMembershipSavings.description: Whether membership savings should be displayed

createdById.description: ID of the user that created this membership type

id.description: ID of the recurring service item

membershipTypeId.description: Membership type ID associated with the item

recurringServiceTypeId.description: Recurring service type ID associated with the item

offset.description: Number of weeks or months (depending on offset type) between membership start and recurring service start

offsetType.description: Offset type of the recurring service type associated with this item, can be weeks (0) or months (1)

allocation.description: The percentage of deferred revenue allocated to the recurring service item

createdOn.description: When recurring service item was created

createdById.description: ID of the user that created this recurring service item

targetId.description: ID of the discount's target, which can be either a business unit or pricebook category

createdById.description: ID of the user that created this discount item

active.description: Whether the duration/billing option is active

createdById.description: ID of the user that created this duration/billing option

data.description: The collection of result items, will never have more than PageSize items

createdOn.description: When recurring service type was created

createdById.description: ID of the user that created this recurring service type

modifiedOn.description: When recurring service type was modified

active.description: Whether recurring service type is active

recurrenceType.description: The recurrence type (e.g. Daily, Weekly, Monthly)

recurrenceInterval.description: The recurrence interval for the given recurrence type

recurrenceMonths.description: A list of months when the recurring service occurs, if it is a seasonal recurrence type

durationLength.description: The recurrence duration length (number of events)
